projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

body.head: >|| dūtavākyam ||

sp.speaker: sūtradhāraḥ
sp.p: evamāryamiśrān vijñāpayāmi| aye kiṃ nu khalu mayi vijñāpanavyagre śabda iva śrūyate| aṅga paśyāmi|

body.p: bho bhoḥ pratihārādhikṛtāḥ| mahārājo duryodhanaḥ samājñāpayati|

sp.speaker: kāñcukīyaḥ
sp.p: bho bhoḥ pratihārādhikṛtāḥ mahārājo duryodhanaḥ samājñāpayati| adya sarvapārthivaiḥ saha mantrayitumicchāmi| tadāhūyantāṃ sarve rājāna iti|
aye ayaṃ mahārājo duryodhana ita evābhivartate| ya eṣaḥ

lg.l: uddhūtaroṣamiva me hṛdayaṃ saharṣaṃ prāptaṃ raṇotsavamimaṃ sahasā vicintya|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau ucyatām| asti mamaikādaśākṣauhiṇībalasamudayaḥ| asya kaḥ senāpatirbhavitumarhatīti| kimāhaturbhavantau| mahānkhalvayamarthaḥ| mantrayitvā vaktavyamiti| sadṛśametat| tadāgamyatāṃ mantraśālāmeva praviśāmaḥ|

ācārya abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| pitāmaha abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| mātula abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau praviśatāṃ bhavantau| bho bhoḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ svairaṃ praviśantu bhavantaḥ| vayasya karṇa praviśāvastāvat|

ācārya etatkūrmāsanam| āsyatām| pitāmaha etatsiṃhāsanam| āsyatām| mātula etaccarmāsanam| āsyatām| āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau āsātāṃ bhavantau| bho bhoḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ| kimiti kimiti| mahārājo nāsta iti| aho sevādharmaḥ| nanvayamahamāse| vayasya karṇa tvamapyāssva|
āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau ucyatām| asti mamaikādaśākṣauhiṇībalasamudayaḥ| asya kaḥ senāpatirbhavitumarhatīti|
kimāha mātulaḥ| atrabhavati gāṅgeye sthite ko'anyaḥ senāpatirbhavitumarhatīti| samyagāha mātulaḥ| bhavatu bhavatu pitāmaha eva bhavatu| vayamapyetadabhilaṣāmaḥ|

lg.l: gāṅgeyamūrdhni patitairabhiṣekatoyaiḥ sārdhaṃ patantu hṛdayāni narādhipānām|| 5 ||

sp.speaker: kāñcukīyaḥ
sp.p: jayatu mahārājaḥ| eṣa khalu pāṇḍavaskandhāvārāddautyenāgataḥ puruṣottamo nārāyaṇaḥ|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: mā tāvat| bho bādarāyaṇa kiṃ kiṃ kaṃsabhṛtyo dāmodarastava puruṣottamaḥ| sa gopālakastava puruṣottamaḥ| bārhadrathāpahṛtaviṣayakīrtibhogastava puruṣottamaḥ| aho pārthivāsannamāśritya bhṛtyajanasya samudācāraḥ| sagarvaṃ khalvasya vacanam| ā apadhvaṃsa|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: saṃbhrama iti| ā manuṣyāṇāmastyeva saṃbhramaḥ| uttiṣṭhotiṣṭha|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: idānīṃ prasanno'asmi| ka eṣa dūtaḥ prāptaḥ|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: keśava iti| evameṣṭavyam| ayameva samudācāraḥ| bho bho rājānaḥ dautyenāgatasya keśavasya kiṃ yuktam|
kimāhurbhavantaḥ| arghyapradānena pūjayitavyaḥ keśava iti| na me rocate| grahaṇamasyātra hitaṃ paśyāmi|

lg.l: grahaṇamupagate tu vāsubhadre hṛtanayanā iva pāṇḍavā bhaveyuḥ|

sp.p: api ca yo'atra keśavasya pratyutthāsyati sa mayā dvādaśasuvarṇabhāreṇa daṇḍyaḥ| tadapramattā bhavantu bhavantaḥ|ātmagatamko nu khalvidānīṃ mamāpratyutthānasyopāyaḥ| hanta dṛṣṭa upāyaḥ|prakāśambādarāyaṇa ānīyatāṃ sa citrapaṭo nanu yatra draupadīkeśāmbarāvakarṣaṇamālikhitam|ātmagatamtasmindṛṣṭivinyāsaṃ kurvannotthāsyāmi keśavasya|

sp.speaker: kāñcukīyaḥ
sp.p: yadājñāpayati mahārājaḥ|niṣkramya praviśya|jayatu mahārājaḥ| ayaṃ sa citrapaṭaḥ|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: aho darśanīyo'ayaṃ citrapaṭaḥ| eṣa duḥśāsano draupadīṃ keśahaste gṛhītavān| eṣā khalu draupadī|
eṣa durātmā bhīmaḥ sarvarājasamakṣamavamānitāṃ draupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā pravṛddhāmarṣaḥ sabhāstambhaṃ tulayati| eṣa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

lg.l: vigatamaraṇaśaṅkau satvaraṃ bhrātaraṃ me harimiva mṛgapotau tejasābhiprayātau|| 10 ||
nīco'ahameva viparītamatiḥ kathaṃ vā roṣaṃ parityajatamadya nayānayajñau|
akṣānkṣipansa kitavaḥ prahasansagarvaṃ saṃkocayanniva mudaṃ dviṣatāṃ svakīrtyā|
svairāsano drupadarājasutāṃ rudantīṃ kākṣeṇa paśyati likhatyapi gāṃ nayajñaḥ|| 12 ||

sp.p: etāvācāryapitāmahau tāṃ dṛṣṭvā lajjāyamānau paṭāntāntarhitamukhau sthitau| aho asya varṇāḍhyatā| aho bhāvopapannatā| aho yuktalekhatā| suvyaktamālikhito'ayaṃ citrapaṭaḥ| prīto'asmi| ko'atra|

lg.l: prāptaḥ kilādya vacanādiha pāṇḍavānāṃ dautyena bhṛtya iva kṛṣṇamatiḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ |
śrotuṃ sakhe tvamapi sajjaya karṇa karṇau nārīmṛdūni vacanāni yudhiṣṭhirasya || 13 ||

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: adya khalu dharmarājavacanāddhanaṃjayākṛtrimamitratayā cāhavadarpamanuktagrāhiṇaṃ suyodhanaṃ prati mayāpyanucitadautyasamayo'anuṣṭhitaḥ| atha ca

lg.l: bhīmasya kopaśikhinā yudhi pārthapattri- caṇḍānilaiśca kuruvaṃśavanaṃ vinaṣṭam|| 14 ||
suyodhano hi māṃ dṛṣṭvā naiva kāryaṃ kariṣyati|| 16 ||

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: kathaṃ kathaṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntāḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ| alamalaṃ saṃbhrameṇa| svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: kathaṃ kathaṃ keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntāḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ| alamalaṃ saṃbhrameṇa| smaraṇīyaḥ pūrvamāśrāvito daṇḍaḥ| nanvahamājñaptā|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: ācārya āsyatāṃ| gāṅgeyapramukhā rājānaḥ svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ| vayamapyupaviśāmaḥ|upaviśyaaho darśanīyo'ayaṃ citrapaṭaḥ| mā tāvat| draupadīkeśāmbarākarṣaṇamatrālikhitam| aho nu khalu

lg.l: dharmātmajo vāyusutaśca bhīmo bhrātārjuno me tridaśendrasūnuḥ|
yamau ca tāvaśvisutau vinītau sarve sabhṛtyāḥ kuśalopapannāḥ|| 19 ||

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: sadṛśametadgāndhārīputrasya| atha kimatha kim| kuśalinaḥ sarve| bhavato rājye śarīre bāhyābhyantare ca kuśalamanāmayaṃ ca pṛṣṭvā vijñāpayanti yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ|

lg.l: anubhūtaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ saṃpūrṇaḥ samayaḥ sa ca|
tadāprabhṛtyeva sa dāraniḥspṛhaḥ parātmajānāṃ pitṛtāṃ kathaṃ vrajet|| 21 ||
vicitravīryo viṣayī vipattiṃ kṣayeṇa yātaḥ punarambikāyām|
vyāsena jāto dhṛtarāṣṭra eva labheta rājyaṃ janakaḥ kathaṃ te|| 22 ||
evaṃ parasparavirodhavivardhanena śīghraṃ bhavetkurukulaṃ nṛpa nāmaśeṣam|
tatkartumarhati bhavānapakṛtya roṣaṃ yattvāṃ yudhiṣṭhiramukhāḥ praṇayādbruvanti|| 23 ||
talloke na tu yācyate na tu punardīnāya vā dīyate|
syālaṃ tava gurorbhūpaṃ kaṃsaṃ na te dayā|
vṛddhaṃ svapitaraṃ baddhvā hato'ayaṃ mṛtyunā svayam|| 27 ||

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: sarvathā vañcitastvayā kaṃsaḥ| alamātmastavena| na śauryametat| paśya|

lg.l: palāyamānasya bhayāturasya śauryaṃ tadetatkva gataṃ tavāsīt|| 28 ||

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: bhoḥ suyodhana deśakālāvasthāpekṣitaṃ khalu śauryaṃ nayānugāminām| iha tiṣṭhatu tāvadasmadgataḥ parihāsaḥ| svakāryamanuṣṭhīyatām|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: bhoḥ suyodhana kiṃ na jānīṣe'arjunasya balaparākramam|

lg.l: anyathā sāgarāntāṃ gāṃ hariṣyanti hi pāṇḍavāḥ|| 34 ||

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: bhoḥ kurukulakalaṅkabhūta ayaśolubdha vayaṃ kila tṛṇāntarābhibhāṣakāḥ|

lg.l: avadhyāṃ pramadāṃ hatvā hayaṃ govṛṣameva ca|

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: gaccha gaccha paśukhuroddhatareṇurūpitāṅgo vrajameva| viphalīkṛtaḥ kālaḥ|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: evamastu| na vayamanuktasaṃdeśā gantumicchāmaḥ| tadākarṇyatāṃ yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃdeśaḥ|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: na vyāharati kila māṃ suyodhanaḥ| bhoḥ

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ
sp.p: kathaṃ yāsyati kila keśavaḥ| duḥśāsana durmarṣaṇa durmukha durbuddhe duṣṭeśvara dūtasamudācāramatikrāntaḥ keśavo badhyatām| kathamaśaktāḥ| duḥśāsana na samarthaḥ khalvasi|
ayamaśaktaḥ| mātula badhyatāmayaṃ keśavaḥ| kathaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ patati| bhavatu| ahameva pāśairbadhnāmi|pāśamudyamyopasarpati

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: kathaṃ baddhukāmo māṃ kila suyodhanaḥ| bhavatu| suyodhanasya sāmarthyaṃ paśyāmi|viśvarūpamāsthitaḥ

sp.speaker: duryodhanaḥ

lg.l: praharasi yadi vā tvaṃ durnivāraiḥ surāstraiḥ|

sp.p: āḥ tiṣṭhedānīm| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| aho hrasvatvaṃ keśavasya| āḥ tiṣṭhedānīm| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| aho dīrghatvaṃ keśavasya| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| sarvatra mantraśālāyāṃ keśavā bhavanti| kimidānīṃ kariṣye| bhavatu dṛṣṭam| bho bho rājānaḥ ekenaikaḥ keśavo badhyatām| kathaṃ svayameva pāśairbaddhāḥ patanti rājānaḥ| sādhu bho jambhaka sādhu|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ kāryamahameva sādhayāmi| bhoḥ sudarśana itastāvat|

sp.speaker: sudarśanaḥ
sp.p: vilokyaaye ayaṃ bhagavānhastinapuradvāre dūtasamudācāreṇopasthitaḥ| kutaḥ khalvāpaḥ kutaḥ khalvāpaḥ| bhagavati ākāśagaṅge āpastāvat| hanta sravati|ācamyopasṛtyajayatu bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ|praṇamati

sp.speaker: sudarśanaḥ
sp.p: kathaṃ kathaṃ karmakāla iti| ājñāpayatu bhagavānājñāpayatu|

lg.l: yadi lavaṇajalaṃ vā kandaraṃ vā girīṇāṃ

sp.speaker: sudarśanaḥ
sp.p: yadājñāpayati bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| kathaṃ kathaṃ gopālaka iti| tricaraṇātikrāntatriloko nārāyaṇaḥ khalvatra bhagavān| śaraṇaṃ vrajantu bhavantaḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye etadbhagavadāyudhavaraṃ śārṅgaṃ prāptam|
bho bhoḥ śārṅga praśāntaroṣo bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye iyaṃ kaumodakī prāptā|
he kaumodaki praśāntaroṣo bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| hanta nivṛttā| yāvadgacchāmi| aye ayaṃ pāñcajanyaḥ prāptaḥ|
he pāñcajanya praśāntaroṣo bhagavān| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ| aye nandakāsiḥ prāptaḥ|
he nandaka praśāntaroṣo bhagavān| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye etāni bhagavadāyudhavarāṇi|

hanta nivṛttāḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye atyuddhūto vāyuḥ| atitapatyādityaḥ| calitāḥ parvatāḥ| kṣubdhāḥ sāgarāḥ| patitā vṛkṣāḥ| bhrāntā meghāḥ| pralīnā vāsukiprabhṛtayo bhujaṃgeśvarāḥ| kiṃ nu khalvidam| aye ayaṃ bhagavato vāhanaḥ garuḍaḥ prāptaḥ|
he kāśyapapriyasuta garuḍa praśāntaroṣo bhagavāndevadeveśaḥ| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ| yāvadgacchāmi|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: aye vṛddharājasvara iva| bho rājan eṣa sthito'asmi|

sp.speaker: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ
sp.p: kva nu khalu bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| kva nu khalu bhagavānpāṇḍavaśreyaskaraḥ| kva nu khalu bhagavānviprapriyaḥ| kva nu khalu bhagavāndevakīnandanaḥ|

sp.speaker: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ
sp.p: anugṛhīto'asmi| bhagavan idamarghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca pratigṛhyatām|

sp.speaker: vāsudevaḥ
sp.p: sarvaṃ gṛhṇāmi| kiṃ te bhūyaḥ priyamupaharāmi|
